name: ValeroLab
body:
### Our Laboratory
We are dedicated to understanding the biomechanics, neuromuscular control and clinical rehabilitation of human mobility, with an emphasis on dexterous hand function. Towards this end, we employ a synergy of experimental and theoretical techniques.

### Contact
Please reach out to Emily Lawrence (ellawren@usc.edu) for all lab inquiries. This website is managed by Brian Cohn (@bcohn12).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
